synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director：Tomomi KOMAZAKI
Music：Tomomi KOMAZAKI
Sound Design：Sachi TAKAHASHI
producer : Yuichi ITO

Synopsis：
One morning in the rainy season.A woman with curly hair wakes up.Phantasmagorical images of self-hatred come to her one after another.

(Source: YouTube)
